educational.description_template: Learn everything you need to know about {topic} in this comprehensive guide. We cover {key_points} and provide expert insights for {target_audience}.

tips.description_template: Discover 5 crucial tips for {insurance_type} that can save you time and money. Perfect for {target_audience}.

reviews.description_template: In-depth review of {insurance_company} covering coverage options, pricing, customer service, and more. Find out if it's the right choice for {target_audience}.

case_studies.title_template: Real Case Study: How {client_type} Saved {amount} on {insurance_type}
